Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental hygiene - United States
description: Episode of Series "Care of the sick and injured". A United States Navy training film featuring instructive animations demonstrating male genitourinary function. Describes various ways of assisting the male bed patient to pass water when difficulty in doing so occurs. The last resort, catheterising, is illustrated in detail.
related_objects: Series; S00154; Care of the sick and injured; Active; 1943
